channel.title: Noobscape Question
channel.description:
Hi, I'm new at this but I learn quick, I need no help with setting up, Its only for learning purposes. I run this local. My question is: On server side LOCS I edited Npcloc.xml for my King Black Dragon to wonder from Varrock West side Mines to Varrock East side Mines. But I get an error not when compiling but after I load server. My X,Y coordinates are incorrect. Here is an example.
[code]<NPCLoc> <id>477</id> // King Black Dragon Bot Stopper <startX>158</startX> <startY>544</startY> <minX>158</minX> <maxX>72</maxX> <minY>544</minY> <maxY>542</maxY> </NPCLoc>[/code]
I know this is wrong as it won't work, can someone explain to me what I did wrong?
Thanks

item.title: Noobscape Question
item.dc:creator: @Rheem Rheem
item.description:
@Rheem wrote:

Thanks, I’ll try it out…

Read full topic

item.title: Noobscape Question
item.dc:creator: @p0ks p0ks
item.description:
@p0ks wrote:

Plus your startY cant be higher than maxY

Read full topic

item.title: Noobscape Question
item.dc:creator: @Nemesis1 Nemesis-
item.description:
@Nemesis1 wrote:

maxX can’t be less than startX,

Read full topic

item.title: Noobscape Question
item.dc:creator: @Rheem Rheem
item.description:
@Rheem wrote:

Hi,
I’m new at this but I learn quick, I need no help with setting up, Its only for learning purposes. I run this local.
My question is: On server side LOCS I edited Npcloc.xml for my King Black Dragon to wonder from Varrock West side Mines to Varrock East side Mines. But I get an error not when compiling but after I load server. My X,Y coordinates are incorrect. Here is an example.

<NPCLoc> <id>477</id> // King Black Dragon Bot Stopper <startX>158</startX> <startY>544</startY> <minX>158</minX> <maxX>72</maxX> <minY>544</minY> <maxY>542</maxY> </NPCLoc>

I know this is wrong as it won’t work, can someone explain to me what I did wrong?

Thanks
